titles.title: To designate a highway bypass in Pine Bluff, Arkansas, as the "Wiley A. Branton, Sr. Memorial Highway".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Ground Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/10/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation, if requested by the Arkansas State highway agency, to designate the United States Route 65 Southern Bypass in Pine Bluff, Arkansas, as the Wiley A. Branton, Sr. Memorial Highway.
